meanings.sent1: The witch cast the wickedest spell on the village.
meanings.sent2: The villain in the story had the wickedest intentions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat gave a wickedest grin after knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The storm unleashed its wickedest fury upon the small town.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was filled with the wickedest secrets of the past.

meanings.sent1: The skateboarder performed the wickedest trick at the competition.
meanings.sent2: The new video game has the wickedest graphics I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The party had the wickedest decorations, making it a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice was the wickedest instrument in the band.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers were the wickedest among all the characters.
